verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song.) We <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H430>God,<s%> we <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks,<s%> For Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7138>near;<s%> Men <S%H5608>declare<s%> Thy <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H6381>works.<s%>
<S%H3588>"When<s%> I <S%H3947>select<s%> an <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time,<s%> It is I who <S%H8199>judge<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
"The <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it <S%H4127>melt;<s%> It is I who have <S%H8505>firmly<s%> <S%H8505>set<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
"I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1984>boastful,<s%> 'Do not <S%H1984>boast,<s%>' And to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> 'Do not <S%H7311>lift<s%> up the <S%H7161>horn;<s%>
Do not <S%H7311>lift<s%> up your <S%H7161>horn<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> Do not <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H6277>insolent<s%> <S%H6677>pride.<s%>' "
For not from the <S%H4161>east,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> from the <S%H4057>desert<s%> [comes] <S%H7311>exaltation;<s%>

For a <S%H3563>cup<s%> is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H2560>foams;<s%> It is <S%H4392>well<s%> <S%H4538>mixed,<s%> and He <S%H5064>pours<s%> out of <S%H2088>this;<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> must <S%H4680>drain<s%> [and] <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8354>down<s%> its <S%H8105>dregs.<s%>
But as for me, I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> [it] <S%H5769>forever;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> He will <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>off,<s%> [But] the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up.
